Major_Arcs.title: Early Misadventures
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc encompasses the initial events including King Guz's near-drowning and Alley's opportunistic debt reminder, followed by Dinny's clumsy tree collisions due to old age.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's Rescue and Debt
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details King Guz's drowning, Alley's rescue, and the immediate aftermath where Alley brings up an old debt, showcasing Alley's character.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Clumsiness
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dinny's problem of bumping into trees due to old age and mileage, establishing a new issue for Alley and Dinny.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Replacement Saga
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the consideration of replacing Dinny due to his age and clumsiness, the visit to Honest Zog's dealership, the mishaps with a new dinosaur, and ultimately Dinny's farewell and sale.

sub_scenes.title: Considering Replacement & Dealership Visit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the initial discussion about replacing Dinny and the subsequent visit to Honest Zog's dinosaur dealership to explore options.

narrative_arcs.title: Shopping at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Dinny vs New Dinosaur
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene contrasts Dinny with a new, faster dinosaur, leading to Dinny getting bitten and complaints at the dealership.

narrative_arcs.title: The Zippy Dinosaur's Speed and Dinny's Bite
Complaints at Honest Zog's and the Damaged Tail

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Farewell and Sale
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the emotional farewell to Dinny, a flashback to his training, and his eventual sale at the dealership.

narrative_arcs.title: Farewell to Dinny and Decision to Trade
Dinny Offered for Sale at Honest New & Used Dinosaurs

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Test Ride and Mistreatment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the sales pitch for Dinny, a test ride that goes wrong, and Dinny's subsequent mistreatment after being sold.

narrative_arcs.title: Continuing the Sales Pitch and Price Negotiation
Dinny's Test Ride and Tree Collision
Fall from Dinny, Scolding, and Dinny's Voice

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Rescue and Runaway
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dinny being comforted and then running away while being chased, culminating in a near collision.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Troubles - Part 1
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores various romantic misunderstandings and comedic situations, from Coola's rejection of Alley to lessons in romance and jealous confrontations.

sub_scenes.title: Coola's Rejection and Fishing Trip
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Coola rejecting Alley's fishing invitation and a misogynistic fisherman's complaints being ironically silenced.

narrative_arcs.title: Rejected Fishing Trip and Unexpected Consequence
Misogynistic Fishermen and Their Noisy Outbursts

sub_scenes.title: Oola's Romantic Competition and Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows a caveman's suspicion of romantic competition, leading to an investigation and a surprising shift in romantic interest.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Confrontation and Romance Lessons
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves a jealous confrontation, physical violence, and humorous romance lessons from a 'French' caveman.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Troubles - Part 2
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc continues exploring romantic competition and misunderstandings, featuring flower and log offerings and a comical hand-kissing incident.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Gestures and Crocodile Incident
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases competing romantic gestures with flowers and a log, leading to a humorous encounter with a crocodile.

narrative_arcs.title: Log as a Bridge and Crocodile Encounter
Reprimand for Vulgarity and Squashed Crocodile

sub_scenes.title: Hand Kissing Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene revolves around a jealous misunderstanding involving hand-kissing, leading to a physical altercation and comical resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Clarification and Comical Resolution - Kissing Hand

Major_Arcs.title: Dancing and Infidelity
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around themes of infidelity accusations, domestic disputes, dancing, and the chaotic consequences of a dance called 'the twitch'.

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity and Domestic Dispute
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces infidelity accusations, a domestic dispute with clubbing, and a shift towards romantic reformation.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Reformation and Polite Greeting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Alley's attempt at romantic reformation and a contrasting scene of exaggerated politeness.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Cavemen's Views on Women
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene is a brief interlude with fishing cavemen humorously lamenting about women.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Dance and Injuries
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'twitch' dance and the injuries it causes, setting up Oola's ultimatum to Alley.

sub_scenes.title: Learning and Demonstrating the Twitch
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Alley's disastrous first dance lesson and Miss Glump's name reveal, leading to Alley's attempt to demonstrate the twitch.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Chaos and Hospital
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the escalating chaos caused by 'the twitch', including humiliation and a hospital ward filled with 'twitch' victims.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel Research
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows researchers using a time machine to gather information about 16th Century Spain, leading to Alley Oop's involvement in a bullfight and romantic jealousy.

sub_scenes.title: Research Dilemma and Time Machine Solution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the research problem and the decision to use a time machine and Alley Oop for firsthand information.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dilemma of 16th Century Spanish History

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel to Romance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the researchers observing Alley Oop and Oola romantically, leading to the interruption of their kiss for the Spain assignment.

narrative_arcs.title: The Kiss Interrupted by Time Travel

sub_scenes.title: Spain Assignment and Return to Past
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dr. Wonmug assigning Alley Oop to Spain for research and sending them back in time.

narrative_arcs.title: The Spain Assignment and Return to the Past

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in Medieval Spain and Serenade
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley Oop and Oola's arrival in Spain and introduces a separate serenade scene.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Medieval Spain and Hostile Welcome
The Serenade and the Dame's Ire

sub_scenes.title: Alley Oop Intervenes in Serenade
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Alley Oop intervening in the serenade, leading to a lute attack and Oola's surprising reaction.

narrative_arcs.title: Alley Oop's Intervention and Demand for Manners
The Lute Attack and Dame's Annoyance

sub_scenes.title: Oola's Boyfriend Reveal and Matador
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the serenader is Oola's boyfriend and a famous matador, leading to Alley Oop becoming involved in a bullfight.

narrative_arcs.title: The Famous Matador and the Manager's Threat

sub_scenes.title: Bool-Fight and Return
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the aftermath of the matador's injury, Alley Oop's participation in the bullfight, his victory, and return to the present.

narrative_arcs.title: Aftermath and Pressure for a Toreador
Alley Oop's Return and Promised Kiss

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy and Unkissed Outcome
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a separate scenario of romantic jealousy related to Spain, resulting in an unkissed outcome.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day Experiment
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the concept of 'King for a Day', where a complainer is challenged to experience the role, leading to mockery and abuse, and the former king's cynical return.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day Concept and Challenge
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'King for a Day' concept and the challenge to the complainer to take on the role.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day - Initial Impression

sub_scenes.title: Royal Proclamation and Reality of Kingship
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene contrasts the formal proclamation of the new king with the harsh reality of how the cavemen treat their ruler.

narrative_arcs.title: Royal Proclamation and Former King's Instruction
Reality of Kingship - Mockery and Abuse

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Former King's Return
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the new king's disheveled state after the abuse and the former king's comfortable return to power.

Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Domestic Life
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on a brief domestic dispute between King Guz and the Queen, highlighting their contrasting lifestyles and the Queen's assertive nature.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's Leisure and Queen's Disgust
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the conflict with King Guz relaxing and the Queen expressing disgust at his lifestyle.

narrative_arcs.title: King Guz's Leisure and Queen's Disgust

sub_scenes.title: Broom Attack and Foot Washing Demand
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the Queen physically attacking King Guz and demanding he wash his feet.

narrative_arcs.title: Broom Attack and the Demand to Wash Feet

sub_scenes.title: Guz's Bath and Vacation Thoughts
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts King Guz complying with the Queen's demand and reflecting on his desire for escape.

Major_Arcs.title: King's Clam and Food Disputes
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores various disputes, including cheating, money fights, clam ownership resolved by the king, and food-related conflicts culminating in the king's abdication.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Disputes: Cheating and Money Fight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces initial conflicts about cheating in a game and a money fight, setting a scene of general dispute.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Disputes: Cheating and Money Fight

sub_scenes.title: King's Clam Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the king resolving a dispute over found clams by taking them for himself, leading to further dissatisfaction.

narrative_arcs.title: King's Clam Resolution and its Aftermath

sub_scenes.title: Disturbance and Oop's Beating
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows a disturbance outside the palace revealed to be Oop being beaten, occurring concurrently with palace events.

sub_scenes.title: King's Wisdom and Dinner
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the king's self-proclaimed wisdom and anticipation for a lavish dinner.

sub_scenes.title: Food Theft and Ulcer Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene disrupts the king's meal with food theft, leading to confrontation and the king's assertion of authority.

sub_scenes.title: Parsley and Carrot Reward
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the king punishing the food thief by dictating a meager meal of parsley and carrot.

sub_scenes.title: Appetizer Satisfaction and Regret
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene contrasts the king's satisfaction with his meal and the caveman's regret about his subservient role.

sub_scenes.title: Peek-a-boo and Punch, Abdication and New Ruler
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features a sudden shift from playfulness to violence, leading to the king's abdication and the proposition of a new ruler.

Major_Arcs.title: Barberous Act Prophecy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around a prophecy and its literal, humorous fulfillment involving a 'barberous act' and a tonsorial parlor.

sub_scenes.title: Prophecy of Bearded Stranger
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a prophecy about a bearded stranger and sets up the expectation for its fulfillment.

sub_scenes.title: Interruption and Coercion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the bearded caveman interrupting Alley and then coercing another caveman, creating initial mystery.

sub_scenes.title: Tonsorial Transformation and Business
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the 'barberous act' is shaving and the bearded caveman is a barber, humorously fulfilling the prophecy.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Malfunction
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes with a humorous time travel malfunction resulting in a Roman soldier appearing instead of historical information.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Experiment Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the time travel experiment and the man's intention to bring someone from the past.

sub_scenes.title: Materialization of Roman Soldier
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the unexpected materialization of a Roman soldier, surprising the researcher.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Malfunction and Realization
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the arc with the man realizing the time machine is malfunctioning and needs repair.
